name: Journalism class: HOT PART 3
description:
Ashley and Jillian continue to investigate the dismissal of the swim coach Wilders. In this part of the novel:
- new witnesses appear in the investigation;
- the plot includes 2 new characters;
- the relationship between girls is getting hotter.Features
  • The third part of novel;
  • А story full of emotions;
  • Story that will branch according to your "choice";
  • Many characters in one story;
  • Surprising ending;
  • Steam achievements.
